About.Title: I want to contribute a beautiful journey to make a better world.

Developers have a power to draw and transform a white empty paper into a meaningful work that can bring innovation to the world and help other people. I want to contribute a beautiful journey to making a better world and having a positive impact.
Des.2: I am interested in Javascript. In development, I have a passion for minimalism which allows to build simple UI and write intuitive but simple code. Simple UI enables users more accessible and easily consume a service and  intuitive code makes easier cooperating between developers. I believe, a professional developer is a person who can solve complex things, translate them in an easy way so that everyone can grasp that, and is good at communication with coworkers.  To be a better developer, I constantly try to educate and push myself.
Des.3: Why I decided to become a developer

1.Des: I developed various functionalities for an online monitoring service that supports SaaS and On-Premise at the same time. I've focused on developing on the service's role-based access control(RBAC) system and log monitoring.

1.Title: [Log Monitoring] Developed Log Monitoring which can handle 1 billion logs per day. Log monitoring consists of the following menus: Live Tail, Log Search, Log Trends, Log Setting, Parser, and Events.

2.Title: [Role-based access control system] Developed a service-wide role-based access control system which is entangled with complex business logic. It can restrict access to the service's functionalities by assigning roles to users using. And I added Organization, the top-level monitoring unit of WhaTap Labs, and developed related features.
